channel.title: Comments on: Using easymock for disconnected Domino Java testing

item.title: By: Axel
item.dc:creator: Axel
item.description: <p>Just to add: While searching material for a Java course I give to some developers internally I've found this excelent tutorial movie.<br />{ <a href="<a rel="nofollow" href="http://eclipsetutorial.sourceforge.net/totalbeginner.html"" rel="nofollow ugc">http://eclipsetutorial.sourceforge.net/totalbeginner.html"</a> rel="nofollow" target ="blank">Link</a> }<br />Its for beginners in Java. It uses Eclipse and TDD methodology. I consider unit testing an absolute MUST these days. </p>
item.content:encoded:
Just to add: While searching material for a Java course I give to some developers internally I’ve found this excelent tutorial movie.
{ http://eclipsetutorial.sourceforge.net/totalbeginner.html“ rel=”nofollow” target =”blank”>Link }
Its for beginners in Java. It uses Eclipse and TDD methodology. I consider unit testing an absolute MUST these days.
